title: Spices Board Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Consultant Assistant Posts
description: The Spices Board of India (Spices Board) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Consultant Assistant Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Diploma can apply for the Spices Board Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee,...
